verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Did Moses know when the branches spoke

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: he would be the chosen one?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Or did his people know that a cloud of smoke

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: would safely lead them home?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Sometimes God will speak through a bush of flames

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: or pillars in the sky,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: But at times His silence fills our days

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: leaving us to wonder “Why?”

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Sometimes we wait, simply to find

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Sometimes His answers come with time,

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Not right away clearly to see,

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Sometimes we never get those parted seas

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: That lead us from the shore.

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: But there is a place

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Where we rest in His grace

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: As we learn to wait on the Lord.

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: If I had my way, there would come a day

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: with a never-ending dawn.

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: No more mournful sighs in the dark of night

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: as I wonder where He’s gone.

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: I would never see how His mercy reigns

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: beneath a cloudless sky.

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: There would be no need for healing grace

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: to comfort when we cry.

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: As we learn to wait…

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: on the Lord.
